thread.title: TERRIFIC STAY AT HOTEL BELLECALIRE
thread.title_full: TERRIFIC STAY AT HOTEL BELLECALIRE - Review of Hotel Belleclaire, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 678carye
title: TERRIFIC STAY AT HOTEL BELLECALIRE
text: I highly recommend this old world meets modern world charm hotel to everyone! It's great location offers a variety of things to do and see. Central park its just a few blocks away as well as shopping, dinning and catching the subway to get around town. The friendly and courteous staff is terrific and go all out to make your stay as relaxed and simple as possible. There really is no need in my opinion to pay for pricey 5 star hotels when The Belleclaire has so much to offer like family suites.
